places.name: Mercado Municipal de São Paulo
places.address: R. Cantareira, 306 - Centro Histórico de São Paulo, São Paulo - SP, 01024-900, Brazil
places.description: The Municipal Market of São Paulo, known as Mercadão, is a vibrant center of culinary delights and a testament to the city's rich cultural diversity.

places.name: Ibirapuera Park
places.address: Av. Pedro Álvares Cabral - Vila Mariana, São Paulo - SP, 04094-050, Brazil
places.description: Ibirapuera Park, often considered the Central Park of São Paulo, is an extensive urban oasis that combines natural beauty, cultural spaces, and recreational activities.

places.name: São Paulo Museum of Art (MASP)
places.address: Avenida Paulista, 1578 - Bela Vista, São Paulo - SP, 01310-200, Brazil
places.description: MASP is known for its concrete and glass structure. It houses one of the most important collections of European art in the Southern Hemisphere.

places.name: Catedral da Sé
places.address: Praça da Sé, s/n - Sé, São Paulo - SP, 01001-000, Brazil
places.description: Neogothic in style, the current cathedral began construction in 1913 and is one of the largest churches in Brazil, a historical landmark of the city.

places.name: Avenida Paulista
places.address: Av. Paulista - Bela Vista, São Paulo - SP, Brazil
places.description: It is the financial and cultural center of the metropolis. On Sundays, it transforms into a large pedestrian avenue with artists and activities.

places.name: Pinacoteca do Estado
places.address: Praça da Luz, 2 - Luz, São Paulo - SP, 01120-010, Brazil
places.description: It is the oldest art museum in the city, with a vast collection of Brazilian art in an impressively architected building.

places.name: Football Museum (Museu do Futebol)
places.address: Praça Charles Miller, s/n - Pacaembu, São Paulo - SP, 01234-010, Brazil
places.description: Located in the Pacaembu stadium, this interactive museum explores Brazil's profound connection to football through its history and culture.

places.name: São Paulo Municipal Theatre (Theatro Municipal de São Paulo)
places.address: Praça Ramos de Azevedo, s/n - República, São Paulo - SP, 01031-010, Brazil
places.description: Inspired by the Paris Opera, it is one of the city's most important performance venues, featuring a blend of Art Nouveau and Renaissance styles.

places.name: Batman's Alley (Beco do Batman)
places.address: R. Medeiros de Albuquerque, 82-154 - Vila Madalena, São Paulo - SP, Brazil
places.description: An open-air graffiti museum in the bohemian neighborhood of Vila Madalena. Its walls constantly change with new urban art pieces.

places.name: Liberdade Neighborhood (Bairro da Liberdade)
places.address: Bairro da Liberdade, São Paulo - SP, Brazil
places.description: São Paulo's colorful Asian district, with a strong Japanese influence. Ideal for enjoying its gastronomy, shops, and weekend fairs.
